page.title: 18Guston Village - Detail (1)
page.content: Main village centres are the primary school, church and public house. PRIMARY SCHOOL :-Closed in 1972 after 115 years and moved into new buildings at the Army Barracks. 125 pupils attend, but numbers vary because of army movements. There are 6 teachers, but there will be 4 in September. 15 pupils come from Guston, the rest move with the army. 20 pupils will leave in September to go to Castlemount Sec. School. Sports day is the main annual event. There is no PTA but there are direct links with Guston Church. CHURCH :-Rev.Philpott's Parish at Guston extends to Dover Eastern Docks and includes Whitfield Church. He has 750 parishioners. He takes one service per week at Guston, attended by 10 people of mainly middle or elderly age. Younger people attend the Family service.
